posts.title: Template History with Enveloop: A Historical Timeline for Email Designs
posts.html:
Enveloop is a developer-focused message builder and API that makes it easy to design & send beautiful emails and texts from your app using one simple implementation. You can sign up for free at: https://app.enveloop.com.

Ever held back from experimenting with your email template designs because you were afraid of losing something important? We're excited to introduce Template History in Enveloop – a feature that gives you the freedom to explore new design directions while keeping your previous work just a click, or in our case, a slider away.

Design Without Limits, Create Without Fear

Template Timeline transforms how you approach email design by eliminating the "what if I mess this up?" worry. Now you can:

  • Freely experiment with bold new designs
  • Try different copy variations without losing your original text
  • Test new layouts knowing you can always go back
  • Keep a living archive of your design evolution
  • Revisit seasonal designs from last year

Your design history is a treasure trove of ideas and sometimes your best inspiration for something new comes from your own past work. Template History allows you to use a slider to drift back in time and see how your user communication has evolved.

Perfect for Creative Teams

For bigger teams using Enveloop, Template History can work like a shared design system. You can:

  • Browse through design iterations for inspiration
  • Reference past versions during creative discussions
  • Learn from historical changes and improvements
  • Maintain brand consistency by referencing previous work

Plus, if any work is mistakenly overwritten, it's super-easy to pull back the last good design and progress forward.

How It Works

  1. Update your Email Templates. Edit the content and design of your email templates. Enveloop monitors everything and keeps a running history of your changes.
  2. Open Template History. Scroll through your template's evolution with our visual timeline interface. You can see all your changes, displayed in the proper media format, and find what you are looking for.
  3. Restore Instantly. Found a version you want to revisit? You have the option to restore your design to the current template or create a new template from that point in history. Simple.


Start Creating with Confidence

Enveloop Template History is now available for all plan levels. Log in today and experience a better way of managing all your email content and design.

Enveloop helps you send better messages and allows you to easily delegate messaging to others on your team!

posts_meta.meta_description: BuildPlane gives commercial construction project managers a focused, lightweight set of software tools that mean less screen time and more building time.
The BuildPlane Project Dashboard gives you the up-to-the-minute status of each project at a glance. You can keep tabs on everything from a single screen.
The BuildPlane Subcontractor Portal gives Subcontractors two-way access to General Contractors so they can do what's needed to move forward and get paid.

We make it easy to request Startup Documents from Subcontractors, track document status, and keep tabs on 
urgent docs, with plenty of work-your-way options.
BuildPlane simplifies and streamlines the process for sending RFPs to contractors and receiving their responses so you get the information you need quickly.
The BuildPlane Subcontractor Dashboard gives Project Managers all the tools they need to manage subcontracts, keeping the project on schedule and on budget.
BuildPlane gives commercial construction Project Managers an easy-to-use set of tools that simplify the tricky business of tracking Change Orders.

posts_meta.meta_title: BuildPlane features: Enable subcontractors to manage their teams
posts_meta.meta_description: To help keep everyone in the loop, Project Managers can now give Subcontractors the ability to manage on their own who gets access to what information.

posts_meta.feature_image_alt: Emoji can provide much needed clarity to even the most mundane transactional emails that you send to your customers.

posts_meta.twitter_description: We're Enveloop – a developer-focused message builder and API that makes it easy to design & send emails and texts from your app using one simple call.
posts_meta.meta_description: Enveloop is a developer-focused message builder and API that makes it easy to design & send emails and texts from your app using one simple call.
Enveloop Templates allow developers to easily create, style, and connect messages to send from their app to their users.
Small improvements you can introduce to improve the subject lines of your transactional emails.

posts_meta.og_description: With some simple improvements, make the messages you send from your application more engaging and your users more successful.
posts_meta.twitter_title: A Healthier Body - A Guide to Optimizing Transactional Email Content

posts_meta.meta_description: With some simple improvements, make the messages you send from your application more engaging and your users more successful.

posts_meta.feature_image_caption: Enveloop allows you to design your content once and, then, share everywhere.

posts_meta.feature_image_alt: Screenshots that show features included with Enveloop and settings for adding webhooks.
posts_meta.feature_image_caption: There are big changes to Enveloop, including becoming a full email provider, powerful logging, webhooks, and even more control of dynamic content!

posts_meta.feature_image_alt: Two logos, one of Enveloop and one of TextGrid on a black background.
posts_meta.feature_image_caption: Announcing support for TextGrid on Enveloop!

posts_meta.feature_image_alt: An illustrated screenshot of the interface for message logging in Enveloop. It has multiple columns and a list of messages.
posts_meta.feature_image_caption: Elevate your email and text messaging insights with Enveloop Logging.
Enveloop Send: An end-to-end email provider.
Let's learn how to use Enveloop and Devise, together, to send better transactional emails.
Enveloop monitors and provides powerful visuals for DMARC reports.

posts_meta.feature_image_alt: A green header image that describes how a user can select colors to add to themes.
posts_meta.feature_image_caption: Enveloop Themes allow you to easily manage branding across your message templates.
Enveloop Template History allows you to quickly scan back to previous design edits, compare, and restore.
